summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5452 for the improvement of 39th Avenue Southwest, from West Holly Street to West Myrtle Street; and on the westerly side only, from West Myrtle Street to West Orchard Street; by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 68874, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
